rooms.description: Spacious living area designed with bohemian decor, featuring natural wood finishes and vibrant textiles.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, promoting family interactions.
Modern kitchen with bohemian accents and open shelving showcasing local artisanal cookware.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed to adhere to Vastu principles by facing east for positivity.
Guest bedroom, decorated in a bohemian style with local crafts and natural textures.
Additional bedroom; designed to incorporate a blend of comfort and artistic elements.
Home theater area featuring state-of-the-art sound and projection system, decorated with bohemian art pieces.
Private gym with modern fitness equipment and natural lighting to promote a healthy lifestyle.
Balcony overlooking the garden, offering a relaxing outdoor space.
